Radios

We reuse the default input radio control to have it own behaviors. Just follow the html structure with cdg-radio class name.
For more implementation document please refer: mdn web docs

Default

    <label class="cdg-radio">
  <input type="radio" name="sample2" />
  <span>I'm the one</span>
</label>
<label class="cdg-radio">
  <input type="radio" name="sample2" checked />
  <span>I'm two</span>
</label>
<label class="cdg-radio">
  <input type="radio" name="sample2" />
  <span>I'm the last</span>
</label>

Disabled

  <label class="cdg-radio">
  <input type="radio" name="sample3" checked disabled />
  <span>I'm the one</span>
</label>
<label class="cdg-radio">
  <input type="radio" name="sample3" disabled />
  <span>I'm two</span>
</label>
<label class="cdg-radio">
  <input type="radio" name="sample3" disabled />
  <span>I'm the last</span>
</label>
